word:
Every debt upon every house of worship among us may be paid if the members of the church will plan wisely and put forth earnest, zealous effort to cancel the debt. And in every case where a debt is lifted, 
                                                                           435
let there be a service of thanksgiving, which shall be as a re-dedication to God of His house.--"Testimonies for the Church, Vol. VI, pages 100-104. 

                                               -
